# et
Phone home y'all.

```js
let pkg
try {
  pkg = require(path.join(process.cwd(), 'package.json'))

  require('@dadi/et')({
    package: {
      name: pkg.name
    },
    productPackage: {
      name: require('../../package.json').name,
      version: require('../../package.json').version
    },
    customData: {},
    event: 'boot'
  })
} catch (err) {
  console.log(err)
}
```
